name: Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team
name_original: Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team
description:
Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team is an arcade-fighting game developed by Spike. It came out on 30-09-2010. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Dragon Ball Z: Tenkaichi Tag Team on PSP.
